features.featureTitle: In AutomationDashboardPage.tsx, programmatically set all automation feature flags defined in automationConfig.ts to true (enabled) on page load if they are not already active, so that every automation toggle (WhatsApp auto-reply, proposal sending, lead follow-up, etc.) appears ON by default and persists to localStorage.

Add the following new services to the seedServices.ts catalog based on the PDF document provided by the user. Until the exact PDF content is parsed, add the services as described: include service name, description, category, at least one package with a name and INR price, and set each service as active/visible. Services to add from the PDF should be appended to the existing seed services array without removing any existing entries.
